entry.title: A God's Fury and A Shattered Knight
entry.summary:
Author: Torched22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,823Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 29

Summary: Hearing Batman's terrified screams, Superman races to Gotham and discovers a brutal scene of assault. Overwhelmed by rage, Kal-El enacts swift and deadly vengeance on the attackers, violating his own moral principles. Now there's no turning back; Superman has killed, and just as bad, he has no idea how to begin to help Bruce heal.

entry.title: Softness in the Streets
entry.summary:
Author: GreenAppleShrimp

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,529Chapters: 1/12Kudos: 10

Summary: Batman and Bruce Wayne are not the same person.Bruce Wayne is soft-hearted and donates from afar, Batman is a man of the streets. The two personas are so different that Batman does not view Bruce Wayne as himself. This is the story of Batman learning who he is when his facets of heroism and altruism are combined.Clark Kent helps speed this process.

entry.title: Baternity Leave
entry.summary:
Author: Gentlefolk_fica

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,692Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 103

Summary: Disbelieving what he was looking at, he turned back to the computer across the cold stone expanse.“Computer- analyze results.”The computer downloaded the ultrasound data and cross-referenced it with his other symptoms.“Additional heartbeat detected. Fetal life form present. Estimated: 7-8 weeks gestation”Bruce blinked again. Ever the logical one when faced with a crisis, he asked: “Any additional data?”“Kryptonian DNA detected.”That’s when Bruce gave himself permission to panic.

entry.title: Like Cats and Dogs
entry.summary:
Author: bajuwa

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 80,988Chapters: 32/32Kudos: 2,075

Summary: In a world where soulmates are represented by animal familiars, Clark wonders if his soulmate is a cat. A literal domesticated feline animal that one could get from the pet store and not just a person with some cat-like personality traits. There’s no other explanation as to why his familiar acts like every single asshole cat meme to ever exist.On the off chance his soulmate is a real human being, well… He would never tell his mother this, she raised him too well, but sometimes Clark wishes his soulmate’s familiar was making him feel just as miserable.---Bruce peels his eyes away from the monitors to look down at the menace on his lap and barely contains a look of disgust. Big blue eyes stare up at him as he rests his chin on Bruce’s thigh, and as their eyes meet, the pathetic, whimpering little whines are replaced by excited huffs, the clickity clack of dancing paws on concrete, and the rhythmic thumping of his tail hitting the leg of the table.Why does it have to be so needy and cuddly all the time?

entry.summary:
Author: Butterfly_Wordsmith

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,887Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 75

entry.title: New to Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: LapineDoodle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,970Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 4

Summary: So what if it's impulsive to move thousands of miles from home to New Jersey of all place? Gotham rent is cheap and have better public infrastructure despite the high crime rate. And beside, not like she can pass on the chance to attend Gotham University with free tuition thanks to grants and scholarship. So, it's time for Reyna to experience the wild Gotham City and potentially get herself into some shenanigans. At least there are bats and birds around to save the day.

entry.title: A Slight Routine Deviation
entry.summary:
Author: lostinreeverie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,778Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 140

Summary: “I didn’t realize the Daily Planet had an arts section.” Clark smiled despite himself. “We don’t. But Wayne Enterprises is the largest donor for this exhibit, and Perry wants a comment.” Bruce hummed in mock understanding. “Of course. Strictly business.” His gaze flickered over Clark, the corner of his mouth twitching. “And here I thought you came all this way just to see me.” Clark and Bruce have a routine when their paths cross at social events—get a quote, catch up, flirt until Clark gets flustered. But Clark’s getting tired of too much flirting and not enough kissing.(Shamelessly inspired by these @waveoftheocean's two pieces (1) (2) on tumblr.)

entry.title: No Longer You
entry.summary:
Author: NFx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,677Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 42

Summary: Despite their differences, despite the devouring guilt in Bruce’s eyes whenever he witnessed the cruelty of his actions in Clark’s psyche, they grew into something more. Bruce provided him with the stability and familiar comfort of belonging- of family, and Clark...Clark became a tender distraction. He brought forward a fundamental change in the bleakness of Bruce’s soul. Once more; a colleague. A friend. A companion, and a partner of day and night.And yet, despite everything, they were not meant to last.
